actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 118(c) of title 28, United States Code, to provide for the holding of court for the Western District of Pennsylvania at Johnstown, Pennsylvania.

summary.text: Adds Johnstown to the list of places where the United States District Court for the Western District of Pennsylvania shall be held.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 118(c) of title 28, United States Code, to provide for the holding of court for the Western District of Pennsylvania at Johnstown, Pennsylvania.
